channel.title: My Hugo Website
channel.description: Recent content on My Hugo Website

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my portfolio website! I am a blogger, web developer and an avid dreamer. I live in Bulgaria. In my free time I enjoy playing the guitar and hiking. I am very passionate about web development. I work as a freelancer and web developer. I am always interested in joining in new projects. Feel free to drop me a line if you have an interesting idea and we can start working on it.

item.title: 4 Awesome Things You Can Do with Hugo
item.description: 1. Create a list page or a post using default templates. 2. Use a shortcode to embed an youtube video 3. The following shortcode shows how to highlight code: <section id="main"> <div> <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1> {{ range .Data.Pages }} {{ .Render "summary"}} {{ end }} </div> </section> 4. Use raw Html in your markdown file. You can always use raw html in md files
